dialogues.text: He's super! Thanks for asking! All things considered he is better than okay! And it's peachee, nothing bugs him Everything is super when you're- Let's fight fight fight against Canada today!!!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The song ends and everyone erupts into applause.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Satan is looking into a large, oracle-like ball. Saddam i around, but a few demons and Kenny are hanging out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The execution is going to happen any moment... We must prepare.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The demons make excited noises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mph rmph rm!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get everyone in hell ready. When the blood of Terrance and Phillip spills, the day is ours!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two of the demons head for Satan's room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Not Saddam. Don't wake him... Uh... I'll tell him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Satan walks to the bedroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cartman approaches the electrical box nervously -- lookin all around for soldiers. He opens the door to the electrical box and sees a large switch labeled ON and OFF.  He reaches to turn off the sw when he feels a tap on his shoulder. Cartman jumps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agh!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then turns and karate-chops in one spastic flurry to see

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Son of a gun!  HECK!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kenny's ghost is again floating in front of Cartman. Kenn again struggles to speak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GO AWAY, KENNY!  IT'S NOT MY GOSH DARN FAULT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mph rmprmmh rm!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have proofs of purchases from Snacky Smores, Kenny!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MPH RMPH RMPH RMPH RM!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AGAGAH!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cartman runs off, leaving the power completely on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ike is still just sitting quietly in the dark attic. Suddenly, the attic door bursts open!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Found one!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Other soldiers file into the attic and grab Ike by the ar

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yep, that's a Canadian alright.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sibi mammama.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The American Soldier picks up Ike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, thought you could hide from us, did you?! Take him away!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The soldiers drag Ike down the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, look at this! (Holding up a book) He was writing some kind of diary...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Diary?  What does it say?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Reading) Cookie monster.  Banana.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweeping, moving MUSIC STING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle is patiently awaiting Mole's return.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn it! Come on, Mole we're running out of time!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle spins around when he hears someone coming. But it's only Cartman. He's panting heavily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys! Seriously! You guys!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What Cartman?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kenny! I saw Kenny again!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, brother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you shut the alarm off, Cartman?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cartman stops breathing heavily and thinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cartman?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just then, all the alarms in the place go off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the distance, the boys hear gunshots. Suddenly, the Mole pops out of the hole. The boys see tha The Mole has been shot up badly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ze alarms! Zey went off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... That was my bad, sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As SHOUTS and RUNNING FOOTSTEPS draw closer, The Mole lay down and begins to die in Kyle's arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please... Do not let ze resistance die...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gentle MUSIC begins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now the light, she fades And darkness closes in But I will find strength I will find pride within Because although I die Our freedom will be won Though I die Ze Resistance Lives on...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Music fades away, as the Mole coughs up some blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's so very cold...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't leave without you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay, I am done for.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I mean WE CAN'T LEAVE WITHOUT YOU - we don't know where the hell we are!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Mole coughs up more blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is your God when you need him? Where is your beautiful, merciful faggot now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Mole dies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHIT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FREEZE!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boys look up to see three large MARINES pointing guns them. Stan makes a run for it. He dashes off at full speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Run, Stan!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the soldiers fires at him. PWANG! PWANG! But Stan disappears into the night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forget him! The night will swallow him up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are under arrest!  Cuff 'em!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So THIS must be the resistance the pentagon has been tracking!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, son of a bitch...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle's mother, and the other mothers of MAC, take the sta again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now, for our big finale, the MOMENT YOU HAVE ALL BEEN WAITING FOR!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Terrance and Phillip are wheeled out onto the stage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Phillip.  This cannot be good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, Terrance.  This is quite the shitstorm we've found ourselves in this time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the other side, Kyle's mom appears with a couple of official looking military people.  The crowd cheers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is my pleasure to present to you, THE EXECUTION OF TERRANCE AND PHILLIP!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd cheers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Strap them in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Terrance and Phillip are then greeted by the EXECUTIONER, donned in a black hood. The scary giant Executioner grabs Terrance and Phillip an puts them into electric chairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Today is a great day for democracy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd cheers. The Executioner steps up to the throw switch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Phillip, this is worse than that trip to Quebec City when I fell asleep in that disco.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, Terrance. I know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LONG SHOT of a desolate, dark area. It has started to rain. Stan trudges through the wilderne looking tired and scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello? Where the hell am I? Is anybody here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few wolf HOWLS sound in the distance. Stan walks on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCO!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MARCO!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No answer. Stan stumbles a bit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dude, weak... Can't go on... Dizzy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stan falls to the ground. His face plops in the rainy mud his head smacks against a rock. Stan is out cold. Just then, a strange sound emerges. It is like a pulsatin WOBBLE. Stan slowly awakes, picks up his head and shines flashlight around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sound gets louder. Stan shines his flashlight on something that is huge and throbbing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OH MY GOD!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle's mother approaches Terrance and Phillip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gentlemen, do you have any last words?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Last words? Let's see... How aboot "GET ME THE FUCK OUT OF THIS CHAIR". How's that for last words?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle's mom nods to the Executioner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAIT!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: General Plymkin walks out next to Kyle's mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have just captured some Canadian Sympathizers!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd cheers. Kyle's mother smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We will execute them along with Terrance and Phillip for your viewing pleasure!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another cheer. The mothers are all very pleased. That is, until they see Kyle and Cartman brought out to the stage gunpoint.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eric?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi, ma.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We also have a Canadian SPY who was hiding out in South Park!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now Ike is brought out at gunpoint.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ike?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle's mother rushes over to General Plymkin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: General... These are OUR CHILDREN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are Canadian sympathizers and they must be dealt with accordingly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But they're CHILDREN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cartman walks over to where Terrance and Phillip are stra into their chairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dude! Terrance and Phillip! Wow! Can I get your autographs?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure, tubby, just as soon as we're killed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't kill these kids!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen mothers, YOU'RE the ones that started all this. Don't get all emotional NOW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we're doing all this to help our children's futures!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, I think shooting our children would adversely affect their futures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... The General is right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MOM!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boobie... This is the only way you're ever going to learn. I have an opportunity here to teach you about consequences.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sheila, you're going to far! Those are YOUR children!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YES! AND I WILL NOT ALLOW MY CHILDREN TO BE RUINED BY SMUT!! (To Kyle) I am sorry young man, but I have had it up to here! STRAP THEM IN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She walks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YOU GOTTA BE FUCKING KIDDING ME!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KYLE BROVLOFSKI, YOU WATCH YOUR LANGUAGE!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stan is still lying in mud, but now he lies before a HUGE pulsating, organic looking thing that belongs in the X-Fi It's the size of a small building. The massive thing starts to glow. Stan looks weak and afr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be not afraid...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stan trembles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Weakly) What...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behold my glory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What... are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am the clitoris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stan's eyes grow wide. MUSIC starts to swell up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The clitoris?! I DID IT!! I FOUND THE CLITORIS!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stan, your friends need you. They are in trouble and you must help them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait, you're supposed to tell me how to get Wendy to like me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are more important matters right now...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO WAY, DUDE! I'VE LOOKED ALL OVER FOR YOU, AND NOW YOU HAVE TO TELL ME HOW TO GET WENDY TO LIKE ME!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dude, she's eight years old, just get her some ice cream or something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of COURSE!! Ice cream!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now go, your friends are in danger... The USO show is a mile east of here, just over that ridge. The clitoris has spoken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The clitoris fades, and just as it does, all the kids of Resistance come running into frame. Wendy and Gregory are with them as well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stan! Stan are you okay?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see you failed in your mission. Terrance and Phillip must be dead by now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendy bends down to pick up Stan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on Stan, we have to hurry. The Canadian forces are about to attack!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendy pulls Stan up off the ground and slings his arm aro her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A drummer plays as the execution begins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We begin with Terrance and Phillip!!! Throw the switch!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The executioner throws the switch and Terrance and Philli start to fry. Kyle, Cartman and Ike, in their chairs, loo horrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goodbye, bastards!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Near death, Terrance cranks out a weak fart. Terrance and Phillip both laugh weakly but merrily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take that, bitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Terrance and Phillip fry, they scream out:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FREEEEEEDOMMMMM!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, FWWOOOMMM!!! A Bomb lands in the middle of the army. BLAM!! It explodes with incredible force, sending d bodies in all directions. Canadian military planes zoom overhead! It's a full scale attack!! From a HIGH ANGLE we see the soldiers all scatter like bu in every direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE CANADIANS ARE ATTACKING!! RUN FOR YOUR LIVES!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FWWOOMM!!! BLAMM!! Another explosion!  Everybody just sta screaming and shooting in every direction.  Total and complete mayhem. One explosion knocks out the electricity, and Terrance an Phillip stop drying. The electricity runs along a wire, across the stage, and right up Cartman's leg. Cartman starts frying horribly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARTMAN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Frying) WAGAGAHGHGH!! YOU GUYS!!! SERIOUSLY!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on Terrance?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Canada is saving us!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally, Cartman is blown clear of the electricity. Kyle picks him up and starts to run along with Ike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Satan opens the door to find Saddam sleeping happily in h cozy bed. He is only wearing little black g-string pantie

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Whispering) Have you finished?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now we see that Kenny is standing at the foot of the bed. holds a gasoline can, and has just finished pouring the l drops underneath the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mph mph.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then move out of the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kenny walks over next to Satan. Satan pulls out a book of matches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I must be strong... I must be strong...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Satan tries to light the match. It won't light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally, the match lights. Satan holds it up-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goodbye, Saddam...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -and throws it onto the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saddam burns to a crisp and Satan and Kenny run out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People run screaming in all directions as a full scale at has broken out. Gunfire, explosions and dead bodies fly a around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ned!  Behind you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ned whips around and mows down a line of Canadians. But o Canadian makes it through, and sticks his bayonet through Ned's neck. Blood gushes from Ned's neck as he collapses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NED!!! NOOOOOOO!!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FWWOOM!! BLAMMM!!! The boys runs as fast as they can amid the explosions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HOLY SHIT! (Zap) AGHAGHGAH!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now when the V-chip shocks Cartman, we can actually see t blue current swirl around his body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEY! THIS V-CHIP IS GETTING ALL SCREWY!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: General Plymkin has followed his men into the trench, whe explosions and gunfire fly all around. He pulls out a wal talkie as his men die all around him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALRIGHT MEN!!!  FALL INTO FORMATION! "HUMAN SHIELD" UP FRONT THEN "OPERATION GET BEHIND THE DARKIES"!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all fall in.  A phalanx of black men, Chef included them, walk out in front of a bunch of white guys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REMEMBER, HUMAN SHIELD!  PROTECT OUR TANKS AND PLANES, TOO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just then, over a ridge in front of them, a line of Canad tanks appears. The tanks are lined up 3 deep.  Behind the a line of missile launchers.  General Plymkin's jaw drops

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy Mother of Johosephat...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The black guys all look at each other nervously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boys run through the chaos.  Body parts and scrapnel here and there. A bloody soldier suddenly stumbles and falls in front of boys holding a massive head wound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! It's Mr. Garrison!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garrison lies on the ground, coughing up blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Children... Take Mr. Hat... Please... Get him out of here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Garrison takes Mr. Hat off his hand and gives it to Cartm Just then, Garrison goes limp. Cartman looks at the Mr. Hat in his hand and scowls. The run from the battle. They pass the American troops, where all the black guys a standing in a human shield around the white guys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, squad... JUST LIKE I TOLD YOU... ONE!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Canadian tanks take aim.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TWO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Canadian tanks fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THREE!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the black guys suddenly jump out of the way, leaving whites completely exposed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tank fire hits the army, blowing all the white soldie to smithereens, including Ned and Jimbo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GREAT PLAN, CHEF!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Operation Human Shield my ASS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From an EXTREME WIDE SHOT, we see all the forces on both sides exchange firepower. The Canadian National anthem ca heard in the distance. We see Mr. Mackey looking like a natural born killer.  He shoots like a maniac into the Canadians.  He wounds one a then marches over to the wriggling body with a knife.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Die Canadian, mmkay?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he drives the knife into the Canadian's chest. But then, suddenly, another Canadian Soldier appears out nowhere, and blows a hole through Mackey's chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mkay-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mackey falls to the ground, dead. Just then Big Gay Al ru through the frame, we FOLLOW him as he skips his way arou gunfire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ooh! Goodness those bullets are going FAST!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another bullet zings by his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jumping Jesus, this is insane!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THUMP! A bullet hits Big Gay Al square in the head. More bullets follow, tearing him to shreds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This shot parodies one of the big shots from 'Saving Priv Ryan'. Just complete overkill. Explosions, helicopters, gunfire and death. Kyle's mother, and the other mothers as well, stand on a ridge overlooking the horrific massacre.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My God... This is terrible...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle's mother holds out her M-16. She is now completely insane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is what we wanted! We wanted our children to be brought up in a smut-free environment!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we didn't want THIS. I just followed you 'cause I made a shitload of money selling Kenny t-shirts!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Lord, what have we done...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wake up, people!  We all have to do things that aren't pretty sometimes! It's the not pretty things that make life worth fighting the not pretty things for! Why do you think children have to be born in hospitals?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other mothers look very confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why does it matter?! My plan is a perfect plan!!  Perfect!  Perfect! Perfect!!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other mothers walk away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHERE ARE YOU GOING?! We need to stop the not pretty things from letting our children be born in hospitals!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're going to find our boys! For God's sake Sheila, you almost had them killed!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle's mother turns back to the battle. More killing and explosions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Killed.  They should only be so lucky. Kyle wasn't even BORN in a hospital!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She charges the field.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Terrance and Phillip are dodging gunfire and super loud explosions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you hear that, Terrance? I farted!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did? Just now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They laugh merrily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, we can take shelter in one of those buildings!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But just then, Kyle's mother comes charging in with her g

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AAAGHGAHGHGH!!! YOU DESTROYED MY FAMILY!!!!!!!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Phillip spins around just in time to see Kyle's mother plunge her bayonet into Terrance's abdomen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AGH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Terrance! NO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blood from Terrance's abdomen slowly spills from his stom Everything gets SILENT as we follow the blood down, down, down... Until it hits the ground with a huge, echoing BWOOOMMMM!! CLOSE UP on Kyle's mother's eyes. CLOSE UP on the spot of blood on the ground...

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO REAL TIME
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the ground starts to open up! FWOOM!! Great fla and ash take over the sky. Satan and his minions explode from below. Everyone stops fighting for a moment, to watch this amazing spectacle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RAAGHGH!!!! MY TIME HAS COME!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Demons and flames emerge from the ground. All the soldier both sides can't believe what they're seeing. Now out of the giant abyss comes Kenny. He dusts himself and looks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As more bombs and gunshots go off. Kyle, Cartman and Ike huddle close to each other in a trench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle... All those times I said you were a big dumb Jew... I didn't mean it. You're not a Jew.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle thinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes I am!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
